#Eigen-decomposition
```{python}
import numpy as np

eig = np.linalg.eig
matrix = np.matrix

p = matrix([[0.7,0.5],
            [0.3,0.5]])

print('eigen value',eig(p)[0])

print('eigen matrix',eig(p)[1])

X_1 = eig(p)[1][:,0]

v = X_1/sum(X_1)

print('X_1', X_1)

print('v', v)

```

#page 15 Method system of linear equation
```{python}
P = np.array([[0.7,0.3],[0.5,0.5]])
n = len(P)
I = np.eye(2)
A = np.c_[P-I,np.repeat(1,n)]
b = np.append(np.repeat(0,n),np.array([1]))
v = np.linalg.solve(np.dot(A,A.T),np.dot(A,b.T))

print(A)

print(b)

print(v)

```
